description: This romantic restaurant on the lakeshore has a welcoming, elegant ambience and a delightful terrace for summer dining. The cuisine pays particular attention to top-quality, seasonal ingredients prepared in traditional recipes with a focus on fish. Cosy, Provençal-style guestrooms complete the picture.
